DOC.brief_summary: Clinical evidence effect plant anthocyanins vision , particularly night vision controversial . Two clinical trial conduct investigate whether blueberry juice consumption affect visual dark adaptation , functional night vision , recovery photo-bleaching retina . One trial ( S2 ) employ 3 week intervention washout period , two dos blueberry plus placebo . The trial ( L1 ) employ 12 week intervention plus 8 week washout test one blueberry juice dose juice placebo .

DOC.detailed_description: Vision Tests : 1 . Dark adaptometry , 2. scotopic visual acuity , 3. scotopic contrast sensitivity , 4. rod/cone conversion , 5. recovery retinal photobleaching
DOC.criteria: visual acuity well 6/7.5 EDTRS acuity chart 2.5m visual contrast sensitivity within normal range 2.5m test Visteck 3000 stereo acuity well 80 second arc Frisby stereoacuity test ocular history refractive glass family history eye disease family history retinal degeneration , glaucoma , diabetes , hypertension , cataract , amblyopia ( dimness vision ) . evidence subject ( upon examination ) amblyopia ( dimness vision ) , manifest strabismus ( unable focus eye one spot ) , anisotropia ( nonuniform responsiveness eye ) . intraocular pressure 21mmHG average three measure use Mentor tonopenXL
